name: Far Away 2
description:
The sequel of my previous game "Far Away".  I have stopped working on it almost a year ago now, due to lack of time, and more exciting projects going on, but I decided to publish it.

Currently there is a bug and you can only play the first scene. I will soon fix it.

Movements are bad, I know, and the game is not polished not even a bit, but it is still playable.

I am now working on a bigger project (check it out on my page), Adrift, a space exploration game, wich is getting much cooler, but this project will indeed be finished, sooner or later.

Let me know what you think of this project, thank you for your time, and good playing!
